DOC.brief_title: Effects Intermittent Hypoxia ( IH ) Metabolism Dysglycemia , Overweight/Obese Persons SCI
DOC.criteria: SCI : 1 . Lower extremity weakness paralysis C5 result spinal cord injury least one year . 2 . ASIA Classification AD Overweight obese classify Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ( kg/m2 ) ≥ 25.0 ( CON ) ≥ 22.0 ( SCI ) . SCI non injure control : Resting SaO2 ≥ 95 % Exclusion Criteria ( SCI non injure control ) : 1 . Currently hospitalize 2 . Resting heart rate ≥120 BPM 3 . Resting systolic blood pressure > 180 mm Hg 4 . Resting diastolic Blood Pressure > 100 mmHg 5 . Selfreported history unstable angina myocardial infarction within previous month 6 . Previous cardiac surgery condition evidence ischemic heart disease 7 . Cardiopulmonary complication COPD 8 . Pregnancy determine urine test sexually active female .
